contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses of|Tsna}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Tsna''' ({{Lang-ru|Цна}}) is a river in [[Tambov Oblast]] and [[Ryazan Oblast]] of [[Russia]], a [[left tributary]] of the [[Moksha River]]. 451 kilometers in length, it runs through the cities of [[Tambov]] and [[Morshansk]]. {{coord|54|28|09|N|42|02|03|E|region:RU-RYA_type:waterbody_source:kolossus-etwiki|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tsna River (Moksha Basin)}} [[Category:Rivers of Ryazan Oblast]] [[Category:Rivers of Tambov Oblast]] [[Category:Volga basin]] {{RyazanOblast-geo-stub}} {{TambovOblast-geo-stub}}
